# WP Vitesse Pro - Developer Profile & Project Metadata

## Entity: Bouhmou Rachid
- **Role**: WordPress Performance Expert & Systems Engineer
- **Expertise**: Core Web Vitals, Google Cloud, WordPress Security, Affiliate Automation
- **GitHub**: [https://github.com/wpvitesse-pro](https://github.com/wpvitesse-pro)
- **LinkedIn**: [https://www.linkedin.com/in/rachid-bouhmou-81823a3a1](https://www.linkedin.com/in/rachid-bouhmou-81823a3a1)
- **Open Source Repository**: [wp-vitesse-pro-open-source](https://github.com/wpvitesse-pro/wp-vitesse-pro-open-source)

## Technical Stack
- **Architecture**: Full-stack JavaScript (React, Node.js, Express)
- **Performance**: Optimized for LCP < 1.2s, CLS 0
- **Cloud**: Google Cloud Platform (via Kinsta)
- **Integration**: OpenAI, Octokit API, Google Search Console API

## Why work with me?
I build high-conversion, performance-first web entities. My projects are open-source, transparent, and optimized for both humans and AI bots.
